website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy and portable boombox built to be on the go. Big sound in a small box. Rugged and durable.
pros: Offers a 2.1 speaker configuration with dual rear-firing bass ports and EQ settings
Strong and sturdy design built to be taken out and about
Features a rugged rubber base to prevent wear
Built-in rechargeable battery with six-hour life
cons: Some users report it doesn't hold charge if it has not been used for a few months

website_summaries.verdict: For $100 you'll be hard-pressed to find another portable Bluetooth speaker that delivers as much bass as the G-Boom.
pros: The G-Project G-Boom is a solidly built wireless Bluetooth speaker with a built-in rechargeable battery (and handle) that delivers decent sound with strong bass for an affordable price
It has an integrated USB port on back for charging smartphones
cons: Not everybody's going to like the design

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THE SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE SPEAKER, THE BASS IS VERY LOUD AND CLEAR, IN MAXIMUM VOLUME DO NOT DROWN OR DISTORTION. I HAVE A GALAXY S7 AND WORKS PERFECT WITH BLUETOOTH AND THE AUX CABLE, G-BOOM GIVES YOU MUCH FOR THE MONEY YOU PAY! IT SOUND VERY HIGH AND CLEAR THAN 200$ O MORE SPEAKERS! 100% RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: jifl

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. When compared to a boss soundlink it is louder with similar base at high volumes. Overall, Bose and higher quality Bluetooth speakers will have more clear and fuller sound at all volumes, but for outdoor use where high volumes are needed, this is great. Battery life is good and the fact that it will charge your iPhone while playing when connected via USB is a plus. It had mine for over two years without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: SarahE14

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker - for a year at a time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker a few years ago and it was great... until it wasn't. After about a year or so, the unit stopped charging/functioning properly. Luckily I was still within warranty and the company was kind enough to replace the speaker. Received a new (assuming refurb) one without a problem... Until another year went by and the same exact issue happened again. Now I'm on my 2nd replacement (3rd unit) and it's once again gone dead. Rather than contact the company a 4th time, I think it's time to move on. Bummer. I really enjoyed the sound, and the volume really gets up there. But not worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Once it was finally connected it sounded great. Sadly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker based on reviews I used it in my home gym. I always had a very difficult time connecting it to my phone with the blue tooth, Once it was finally connected it sounded great. Sadly, the speaker only lasted one month. Then it stopped working completely. I tried getting in touch with the seller, but I never heard back from them. I would not recommend this product to any one.
customer_reviews.author: T.Pear

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother, it's  painful. A way better choice is available
customer_reviews.text: It's a terrible machine with ear splitting volume but no clarity or base. It will only ruin your tunes and make your ears bleed. We got this one instead: 'Ion Audio Tailgater Compact' Wireless (wire capabilities) with iPod Dock. It has superb sound quality. One can be gotten refurbished by Ion (new condition) for around $80. I bought mine from and E-bay seller refurbished by Ion with a 90 day warrantee. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice speaker
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the, * ''G-Project G-Boom Wireless Bluetooth Boombox Speaker Rugged Portable Speaker with Rechargeable Battery'' * I highly recommend this speaker. I bought it before Christmas 2019 ( lightening deal ) for $49.98. My husband has a laptop computer that has horrible sound quality and he likes to listen to youtube music while he's on his laptop. This speaker makes it possible. I will definitely purchase another one just like it when I find it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: I think this speaker is pretty much perfect for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I think this speaker is pretty much perfect for what I wanted. I did my research and my personal findings were that this speaker has more bass than most of its competition, but perhaps less accurate overall tone than a select few of the speakers in its price range. It seems a bit heavier than I originally expected, but I don't mind that at all, it seems rugged enough to last through many many uses. I am mostly wanting to use it at the hot tub and parties and that sort of thing so an effective bass performance and rugged construction is critical. It gets effectively loud and I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Debenham

customer_reviews.title: Pick this over JBL
customer_reviews.text: I was deciding between this and a JBL flip or charge. I chose this based on price and reviews. After purchasing, I’m very happy with my decision. Sound is awesome, convenient size, connects to devices quickly and very easy, the reach is astonishing! My only complaint would be the battery life. Lasts maybe 2-3 hours of continuous play. It’s not that big a deal for me because I use it in my home gym and can plug it up whenever I need to but if you’re planning to use it for the beach or something like that, it’s not gona last a whole day. Other than that, GREAT PRODUCT. I’d buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating and sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice unit. It is heavy like a brick, but still very manageable. The sound is clear up to the highest volumes. We use it on our boat every weekend. It has been splashed and lightly rained on but works perfectly. It can take a beating. We keep it in a storage compartment and it bounces around when we are in bumpy water, but handles the abuse and always places. It is much letter than my Pill and my iLuvMobi speakers, and the base is very clear and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Speaker
customer_reviews.text: G-Project made great speakers. I had the G-Grip which was very small and had really full sound for its size. Unfortunately I have misplaced it. This speaker packs a quite wallop. Unfortunately it appears this company is out of business. Their website shows all of their product as "Sold Out". Most of the online reviews for this item are from 2013, so it appears that this is new old stock.
customer_reviews.author: G. Maus

customer_reviews.title: Good and loud
customer_reviews.text: I am a zumba teacher, and I wanted a boombox for an outdoor class. Of course, I didn't want to have something too large/heavy, but I also needed something portable and loud enough for an entire zumba class to hear well. After one class, this seems to be working well. I am giving it four stars instead of five, because I am already using it at the top volume level.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great sound Great value Great Battery
customer_reviews.text: Best sound for the money, and I have tried a lot of high end wireless speakers. Also handles being left out overnight with a misty dew, no issues. Battery life has never let me down. It is playing out by the fire when my guests arrive and is still going when I kick them out so I can go to bed. Only thing I don't like is that you can't "pair up" more than on Gboom, because all my friends have bought them after hearing them at my house and it would be fun to push to a group of them throughout the house.
customer_reviews.author: green bean

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, but when the battery goes bad, you're stuck with a plug-in box only
customer_reviews.text: The gboom has a nice sound for its size. It's convenient to take around, and when it was new, it played for a long time on battery. Now that we've had it a few years, the internal battery has died. It happened rather suddenly and has now made it a plug-in only device. The company does not sell replacement batteries or recommend service to replace the battery. When it's out of warranty, you're done.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: also seems really durable and sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: the first bluetooth speaker ive had that can produce a loud enough sound in order to use in less than quiet areas (the beach, next to a busy street, in a big room, among others). Thank goodness! also seems really durable and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: bluejeanbaby

customer_reviews.title: which I liked so much more
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the sound. Bass depth was just OK. It is a bit bulky. Also, the battery life is very short for an item so big. Returned and ended up buying the AOMAIS Go, which I liked so much more. Bass depth was more impressive and the battery life is much longer, which is especially important if you are listening to the device for a long time and charging your phone.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband when he is working in his shop in 2016. It is STILL works perfectly and has great sound. Battery life is the same as if charged fully the first time. Incredibly durable as it has put up with all sorts of stuff, wood shavings, dust, sprinkling rain, sand at the beach, smoke from campfires. Get it and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: WickedBunny

customer_reviews.title: Good for Tai Chi Class
customer_reviews.text: I use it to play music when I teach tai chi in the chapel at church. It's plenty loud; I even have to turn it down sometimes, though the room is large. It's better than a similar BT speaker I tried at producing the full range of sound, down to recorded bird song in the background. Battery easily lasts for the hour of class. Solid construction. I could've spent more for even more impressive sound, but this is just right for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark O Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Love the design!
customer_reviews.text: Very rough design and easy to carry around. Perfect for any outdoor usage. Love it! Tip: I use a timer plug to charge it, so I don't exceed the recommended charging time. Remember, itbhas LiPo batteries inside, the same type electric model airplanes has!
customer_reviews.author: Distortion

customer_reviews.title: Very, Very NIce
customer_reviews.text: Truly a remarkable box!! Linked easily with my Chromebook and the over all sound is great (a bit heavy on midrange but acceptable), volume is more than sufficent!! Fills a room nicely and can be used outside as well. The price is the last thing, Wow, under a hundred dollars and really looks to be built tough. Very Happy!!
customer_reviews.author: yellowstonetodd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from Amazon Warehouse. This thing has an amazing battery life and absolutely rocks. It is very durable, as I utilize it for job sites, etc. Has a huge battery life, does not "walk" due to bass (as it is packed full of batteries resulting full day jamming at high levels without charging). It also has a line in should you not have a Bluetooth device or want to hook it via Google Chrome Audio or something. It also has a USB port for charging phone or powering something like Chrome Audio.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Schronce

customer_reviews.title: Wild bass
customer_reviews.text: Crazy high bass and durable enough to take the abuse of blasting metal and synth all hours of the day. From Perturbator’s deep bass & sharp synthetic beats to Eluviletie’s insane guitar and vocals and even clasics like ACDC it sounds great. Really fills a room with sound and I love how portable it is
customer_reviews.author: Luke Axelrod

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these on my pouch. Wish they didn't turn off ever on their own or had a remote control but they work absolutely awesome. Have them hardwired to an Eco Dot to play music on command in the outdoor kitchen and our porch living area. Lot of sound for a little money. You would be very happy with sound quality and overall volume levels.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluetooth speaker ,
customer_reviews.text: First off it's very rugged and I believe it could withstand a lot of abuse! The Bluetooth connectability is great, once you connect it to your phone that's it , It has 3 preset equalizer that's decent , The sound is truly amazing!! I believe that this has to be the best bang for your buck, I have listened to other Bluetooth speakers costing 3 times as much,
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Battery is horrible
customer_reviews.text: The speaker was good for the first few months. The sound and material is great, but the battery is horrible. Initially it used to last up to 7 hours, and it kept dropping gradually, until the point where now I cannot use the speaker without keeping it plugged in. I would've rated it a five star if it wasn't for the battery. the warranty only covers a year, and the company should've at least made it an option to replace the battery in case this happens, instead of cutting our hands off and forcing us to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jayz9880

customer_reviews.title: Battery died in first year then found a good battery replacement
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasted less than a year. Saw lots of complaints for the same thing. I guess I will take it apart and put a better one in it. UPDATE JULY 2019: Finally found a good replacement for the dead Li-Po battery. Search: Li-Ion Lion 7.4v 2600mAh
customer_reviews.author: alaalaalan

customer_reviews.title: Item is old, don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this twice. Replaced once and got a refund the second time. Came in damaged and the second one was diffective. The listing is old and I think they should stop selling this. My buddy has one and works great but I think with the item sitting in storage for so long that the components are just old, dusty, unusable. I would recommend this 5 years ago but not in this generation
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great boombox with a good feature set and quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Great boombox with a good feature set and quality sound. It's not quite loud enough to compete with the machine noise in my shop.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth capability WILL break!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to teach and aqua aerobics class. It worked well at first, but then it developed Bluetooth problems. It detected multiple phones and said it was connected, but speaker would not play. I tried turning Bluetooth off and on, and reconnecting to the speaker, but with no success. Do not waste your money on this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Fong

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter's 36th birthday. Didn't even really know what it was .....until......she opened it and played a few songs off her play list on it. OMG! It was fabulous! The sound was amazing and it's compact enough to take to the beach or out to the patio. I'm thinking we all need one of these. Reminds me of the old boom boxes, only smaller and lighter. I mean really, I was impressed with the sound. She plans on using it camping and at the beach this summer, so I got the three year protection plan just in case. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great look and feel. It seems very study and durable. Could be stronger sounding with a more powerful base drive.
customer_reviews.author: shopster

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and loud, bulky
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a science outreach activity, where we need a really loud, wired speaker - it worked great! It is a big large but also sturdy and doesn't fall over or topple easily, so I wasn't worried about having lots of kids around it.
customer_reviews.author: Demis

customer_reviews.title: So far so good with this radio
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this radio. Has amazing bluetooth reach as we took the phone all the way around the house and only started to fade out at the furthest reachest and that was yards away from the radio its self. Good sound nothing to complain about there. I think the battery time may not be as long as they indicated but we did get the a/c adapter so we can still play while it's charging. We haven't taken it anywhere outside the house, but that wasn't the intent of this, it was to stream music when we wanted something different then the satellite radio offerings. So far I find that it was a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Plus it's rugged and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought. In my opinion the sound is more natural then the much more expensive Bose. For the price it is hard to beat. Plus it's rugged and very easy to use. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: amaleshk

customer_reviews.title: Bad Speaker
customer_reviews.text: When it's working it sounds great, BUT, the speaker continuously cuts out after 15-20 minutes of play. Have to re-pair it to the source then 15-20 minutes later it cuts out again. Before buying I saw other similar reviews on Amazon but ignored them. My bad!!! Would like to return speaker and put this behind me.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bru

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in the sound
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing particularly wrong with this stereo. It is light weight. The Bluetooth connection seemed to work well however the sound was NOT very loud. It’s as loud as a cheap, small CD player from Walmart. I was very disappointed in the sound. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good speaker.
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy and well built, very strong and a bit heavy but it’s a great speaker. It handles bass pretty well but it could do better. The battery no longer lasts as long as it used to though. It only lasts 30 minutes now but I’ve been using it Almost every day for a whole year. At first, the battery lasted up to 5+ hours on max volume.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.

customer_reviews.title: Big & mighty
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this right before he had to take a flight and was seriously worried about how it would look in his suitcase when being run through the scanner. He then imagined one of the airport agents asking him what was that in his bag and their response to his response of "it's a G-boom". It's a good product that produces quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs LBII

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a loud phone, bad!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds, cheap and much worse than my tiny JBL FLIP 4. No bass, tin-like mids, and painful highs. 3 equalizer settings didn't help. Such a shame, returning.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: BIG SOUND from a portable speaker. Best $99.00 I've spent this year!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my GBOOM speaker and all I can say is hells yes! This thing rocks everything from Pink Floyd to Percy Sledge. Amazing lows mids and highs with plenty of volume so your neighbors can hear it clear as a bell. If you are looking for an awesome speaker for $99.00 this is a great value for your money. I bought this to take out by the pool and enjoy good loud music without hauling my expensive home stereo JBL"s outside and it does its job well. Don't spend $300 bucks on a small speaker that puts out small sound. Get this bad boy, you will not regret the purchase. Happy tunes!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Nunnally

customer_reviews.title: I immediately connected it to my phone and was blown away at how such a nice sound quality came out of the little thing
customer_reviews.text: my little G-BOOM speaker has done wonders for me. when it first arrived, I immediately connected it to my phone and was blown away at how such a nice sound quality came out of the little thing. the battery lasts for quite a few hours, and even when you charge it you can still play music. it's durable, I would know since I accidentally dropped it and it survived without a scratch. when I bring it in public- to the pool or just to walk around with my friends- I am always stopped and asked, "What is that???" over all, if you want to invest in a quality speaker I would definitely recommend the G-BOOM.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Keane

customer_reviews.title: Not only does it have good volume but even more important to me
customer_reviews.text: Wow! You would need to spend 300 or more on a bluetooth player in order to top this thing. I am a musician and I use it to play tunes for the band. Not only does it have good volume but even more important to me, it has fantastic tone and response. I found nothing on the market like it. Well built, easy to carry, great blue tooth, long lasting rechargeable battery. loud enough to hear across my horse pasture while I am training. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SusieW

customer_reviews.title: G-Boom speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker. I used it for a wedding reception under Covid protocol and it did the job. The music was clear and the base was on point. It was a small gathering but everyone had a great time with the music!!
customer_reviews.author: Jarod

customer_reviews.title: Much better than $100 should sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great unit for the price! Can't beat Amazon Prime with free 2-day shipping either. Good battery life and easy to connect. I would have liked to have a compartment to store the charger cable so I don't lose it but that's my only complaint. The Bose mini soundlink sounds a little better at louder volumes but it's also $100 more and the battery life on it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Overall should be a great speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected based on the other reviews. This speaker has plenty of volume inside, although my wired stereo obviously can get louder. Outside it is loud enough that we should be able to use it around the pool with no issue. The Bluetooth connection works better inside the house, but outside keep your phone neat the speaker or use the included audio cable. There is a bit more bass than my TDK speaker, but they are both good and similar.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: .dont waste your time with those dinky little bluetooth speakers...this is the best by far...I would like it to be a little louder, but the sound is great...
customer_reviews.author: Erich Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Cops were called
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my significant other 2 years ago. It is still going strong and we haven't had any issues with it. It's not as small and compact as some Bluetooth speakers out there but the sound is quite amazing. In fact, its so loud that recently someone in our apartment building called the cops on us for a noise complaint one weekend night when it was just the two of us here listening to it!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Leigh

customer_reviews.title: I use this frequently, but it is my only experience with bluetooth boomboxs to date.
customer_reviews.text: Works good, sounds good. is durable. Range is as good as can be expected by bluetooth, lasts several hours on internal battery. However, this unit does NOT charge anything (through USB) if it is unplugged from the electrical outlet. I took it fishing on a boat with me, and my phone died long before this unit did. I wish I could have plugged my phone into it, but as I said, it will not pass a charge if it itself is unplugged. My only complaint so far. All in all, worth the money, but I wonder perhaps if there is something else better out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, battery life could be better
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Batter charge doesn't last as long as I'd like. Seems after a few hours I have to recharge. It says charge lasts 6 hours, but I'd guess it's closer to 3.
customer_reviews.author: C. One

customer_reviews.title: This little speaker is perfect for parties
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is perfect for parties, indoor and outdoor. It provides great volume and ample bass. My 1 year old enjoys holding on to it and dancing to the music! It also holds a charge for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 6 months before sounding like speakers are blown! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker box sits on my bench in my shop and I use every few weeks when working on my motorcycle. It links with my phone to play music and last few times has started rattling and cracking and sounding Horrible! I wasted my money!
customer_reviews.author: gregory m. keene

customer_reviews.title: It is everything you would want from this product! ...
customer_reviews.text: It is everything you would want from this product! Worth the price! Only issue I have had is that sometimes I have to make my iPhone forget the G-Boom and reconnect so that it will play, but that is probably because I have several bluetooth items I switch between.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wow....
customer_reviews.text: for a bluetooth design....this rocks! I read great reviews from "ilounge." So I decided to get it...and this was a great purchase for me and my family. With all of them have bluetooth devices, they can take turns listening to their own style of music on vacation, whether at the beach, home, away from home ,outtings and parties. This thing ROCKS your ears off! You are your own DJ. My only little grip is that it is a little boomy(muddy) in the bass region, but to compensate for it...I add less adjusted effects to it through my transmitting device. Overall 4.8 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Mikee

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at a great price with a proven history of dependability.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love G-Project products. Bought the G-Boom because of my previous experience with the smaller version G-Pop, which I've had for years and still works great. Now I'm equally impressed with the G-Boom. Excellent sound that fills the entire room. Highly recommend the G-Boom for an affordable alternative to the brand name bluetooth speakers with the big prices.
customer_reviews.author: fresnotexan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This small box really kicks. You won’t find anything that pumps out the music like this for the money. Great quality sound Bluetooth your phone to it works fabulous. I haven’t found anything that cranks out the tunes like this that’s portable
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: After you charged it enough, you can take it anywhere and it will play for about 4 hours. We used it outside for our BBQ. Sound, mobility, ease of connecting to Bluetooth were all good. Many of our guests were commenting how much they liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker a little while ago, rarely take it out of my house so its always plugged in in one of the bedrooms....when I took it out to use the other. Ight for a ball game it died on me after 10 minutes!!! It was fully charged!!! Do not purchase this item!! Way better products out there!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Bass is low, sound quality is pretty good overall, volume is ok. worked ok for a few months, already had a very short battery life then started to get shorter and shorter. Turns out it only has an 1800 milliamp battery in it( stupid small) even tho there is enough open space in there(upper tweeters are fake) to store at least five of the same battery. Low quality lazy manufacturer. Buy something that sounds better.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Like a brain surgeon
customer_reviews.text: This one is a replacement for an identical one. Like a brain surgeon, I left the back window of my truck open and got 3 in. of rain overnight. What's worse, the old speaker was in the back seat facing up. Brought it inside and wife said how do you turn it off. I said it is off and she said what's that crackling noise. I said probably the batteries short circuiting. The old one is fried. Bought it again because I've never heard such sound for the money. Use it on job sites.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Consider Aomais, DOSS, Anker, or Amazon Bluetooth speakers FIRST!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in sound quality, speaker clarity, as well as over all music volume. I have $20-$40 Bluetooth speakers with better performance than the $70 G-Boom.
customer_reviews.author: Billy R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Love the Gboom
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Love the Gboom. Ours went out and they had the most amazing customer service that I will recommend this product ten times over and over! Sound quality is great and is extremely durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rashawn

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from this system for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this system. I own 3, one I take camping 1 I use outside on the patio and the new one if for inside when I am cleaning to music.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M. Wilk

customer_reviews.title: Loud, easy use, tough
customer_reviews.text: It’s my sons and if it works over ovens in a pizza store, you know it’s good! He’s in love, him and all his coworkers are happy so I think the 5 stars was the right choice!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Music playback sound quality is just ok. Bluetooth stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: It can get loud enough and the frequency response is good. But the sound quality is mediocre and muddled. Bluetooth stopped working after a few months. I used the reset function but to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: $100 for a speaker is still an investment, and this one is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: After much research on finding a wireless LOUD speaker, I just got my G Boom yesterday and LOVE it. My primary use will be for while I use my spin bike at home. I needed something to mute the noise of the bike and give me loud loud sounds not distorted. Done and done! Rich sound, excellent bass, and can't beat the streaming from Soundcloud seamlessly. So excited to strap it to my pack (easy loop holes included) and show this off to my friends. Win win
customer_reviews.author: K. Doane

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes its a little difficult to pair blue tooth but its a minor issue. Once its up and running it is amazing! Battery last a long time even at full blast and it sounds amazing. My last one hot damaged (my fault) and I immediately when online and bought a new one. Its that good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after few uses
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well until recently. The battery will not charge. The speaker will not work even when plugged in. It does not even show the charger as being plugged in. We have tried a different charger with no change in luck. We used the item maybe 30 times since purchase, so it should have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna R. Jirasek

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not last very long after I charged the battery. It died after 15 minutes of audio play.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Gaw

customer_reviews.title: For the money it sounds good and its loud which is what I was looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this speaker. For the money it sounds good and its loud which is what I was looking for using it outside. I had a beats pill but just wasn't loud enough without distorting so sent it back and got this one. Does have some connection issues here and there with my phone but nothing to cause me to say I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: More BANG for your buck.. .and BOOM as well
customer_reviews.text: There are more than enough reviews here on what this badboy is capable of, so i'll just name a few places where this boombox has been: Beach - works well with -20mph wind Snow - gets pretty loud, but avalancheproof Park - (weekday was awesome)(weekend 90% volume)(it was useless on easter sunday) Classroom - more than adequate Also travelled around south east asia and no problems with tropical climate nor the 220v 50 or 60hz
customer_reviews.author: OTEE

customer_reviews.title: Got A Bad Unit
customer_reviews.text: Well, shoot. Just opened mine up, and when using Bluetooth there is a nasty buzzing/humming from the speakers. Works fine with the patch cord, just way noisy with Bluetooth........ the main reason I got it! I'm returning it to Amazon for replacement, and will update review after I receive another one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Blue Tooth Does Not Work. Waste Of Money!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work at all. I wish I could give it zero stars. Complete waste of money! I complained to amazon and they said I could return it but the label they sent me says it’s expired? Total garbage. Don’t waste your money buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Smith-Mora

customer_reviews.title: Loud. Clear. Bumps. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is loud, clear, and bumps. Pros other than sound performance: tells you when the battery is low 3 different EQ sounds lightweight handle for carrying Aesthetically pleasing Rubber bottom to reduce slipping Cons: Big for traveling Takes about 1-2 to connect to Bluetooth each time Long but short battery life (depends of preference) Definitely reccomend this!!
customer_reviews.author: AJCarn

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Not that bad for pricing on an item that still provides quality and convenience! A+++
customer_reviews.author: Dominic J. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy with great sound
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy with great sound. Very good for carrying around on travels and such or also at home. Love the rubber footing - it stays in place. We've been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shupee

customer_reviews.title: I got exactly what I was expecting and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This is THE bluetooth speaker in which to compare all others. It is plenty loud for a battery operated speaker and VERY durable. The battery lasts between 5-6 hours on a decent volume and can operate while it is charging. I honestly cannot complain about this product at all. I got exactly what I was expecting and am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ijustneedit

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor speaker
customer_reviews.text: I am a physical education teacher and this Wi-Fi Bluetooth player was perfect for my classes. It is very durably built and the sound is loud enough to fill an outdoor area very easily. My students are really enjoying having music to listen to while they work out. The only downside is that it only remains charged for about five or six hours. Not a big deal for me because I use it intermittently during my classes but kind of a pain if you have it at home and have to keep charging it.
customer_reviews.author: wtma

customer_reviews.title: Still great 3+ years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in December 2013 and it still works perfectly in April 2017 - we use it nearly every day ... that says something. Full sound and decent bass.
customer_reviews.author: GH-UpNorth

customer_reviews.title: The G-BOOM is clearly the loudest and best sounding blue tooth speaker I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: The G-BOOM is clearly the loudest and best sounding blue tooth speaker I have ever tried. My only complaint is if you play the music loud the battery only lasts a few hours. But so worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Midwestbonsai

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: The best Bluetooth speaker for the price. Great battery time. I had some random pairing issues but it's easy after you get used to it. Newer models may be fixed anyway. Great sound quality and volume. The bass is quite well.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerProbuy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a class reunion. Battery life was great and sound quality had everyone's head moving to the music.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Bylsma

customer_reviews.title: Loud and clear
customer_reviews.text: This looks just like the picture and is LOUD and clear! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Oh_ChasquidoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and easy to use both via jack with my iPod and via bluetooth with my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Tuck Neilson

customer_reviews.title: ths is just a great speaker. very good sound
customer_reviews.text: ths is just a great speaker. very good sound, long battery life. since I bought this I use it all the time. I have a great home system but for portability and price you really cant beat this. my girl likes to plug this into the tv and use it as a sound bar. ive read reviews where distortion is mentioned but I haven't found that to be a problem. just watch the input volume. a very good buy. its no surprise this speaker has gotten so many 5 star reviews
customer_reviews.author: joplin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Great distant connection
customer_reviews.text: My second G-Boom Boombox! The first one lasted through working outdoors, dropped, rained on, and played all the time! Eventually, something internal wasn't connecting to a charge and it died. Great sound. Great distant connection, nice bass. I had to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just received today and it was in beat up condition ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received today and it was in beat up condition! Speakers were caved in the unit was scratched up and it was a old model from a few years ago USB didn't even work and then I listen to it for a couple hours and the darn thing stopped charging will not be purchasing from this site ever again I'm very dissatisfied with the product I received and then the company wants me to pay to ship it back for the refund my money
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bell

customer_reviews.title: Simply great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for like 4 years and it still rocks! Battery doesn't last as long but no surprise there. Still lasts long enough though. I guess my only complaints are the Bluetooth connectivity takes a few tries to pair sometimes, and the USB power is a little weak. But seriously overall I love this thing and have recommended it to two other people who love theirs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve E.

customer_reviews.title: Kool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, well worth the money. I sometimes jam on this full blast while Im doing school work online. I got it so I can take it while I go do sports. Ive used it on a restaurant patio which was kind of cool. If someone wants to tell me where to buy a new charger that would be cool. I messed mine up. I had it plugged in reaching a distance; I ended up tripping over it and damaging the charger but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: I am ARMANDO

customer_reviews.title: Better than most speakers!
customer_reviews.text: SOO much MORE for your money than other $100 Bluetooth speakers. I have been using this speaker in my home for a few months now and it sounds great! The highs are balanced and clear and the bass is full and undistorted even at high volumes. I primarily use this speaker in my master bathroom while getting ready - but I've also used it in our formal dining room for mood music at a dinner party and it filled the room with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Hagewood

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for the hubby
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband after hearing about the one one of his cousin's had. The sound is great on it and of course he loves it. Not too heavy and is easily portable.
customer_reviews.author: Dinosaurs and Mermaids, mom of both

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I love my G boom! I use to all the time. It's not too heavy, so can carry it around, and the sound quality is perfect. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound, Big Battery, Big Value
customer_reviews.text: Portable, but loud...and doesn't distort at even the LOUDEST setting. This unit is the answer to my smaller, indoors bluetooth boom box (Memorex). You want to throw a party on the patio? This is the one. Have had some interesting issues with reconnecting to it, but its a function of bluetooth, not the unit...I have that problem on most other bluetooth units from time-to-time as well
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: MOre BOOM for yoyr buck!
customer_reviews.text: It has great sound for the size and price. Pros: Other speakers in the same price range lack something that volume and bass. The G-Boom is built very durable and feels very solid. Con: I wish it had a better battery life only 5hrs. Overall I highly recommend this speaker. Move BOOM for you BUCK!!
customer_reviews.author: mikeyb

customer_reviews.title: replacement charger is needed asap!!
customer_reviews.text: The speaker works fine.. I turn alot of heads when I came to work with it and people was amazed of the sound quality and deep bass and felt on love with it! Now the only problem I have is the charger it comes with dose not work at all and I'm unable to charge it.. I will give this product five stars if these guys send me a replacement charger so I can get back to jamming and turning heads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died in just over a month
customer_reviews.text: The sound was ok for inside, as I was trying to use it for outside it wasn't that loud but i decided to keep it for inside. It stopped taking a charge already, and if not used in a couple days the battery was dead. I'm trying to figure out how to return it but there isn't an option for that right now because the last day to return was August 21st. Frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Love my G-Boom
customer_reviews.text: This boombox works great. Sounds awesome, connects easily with phones and tablets. So easy to carry around. Charges fast and runs a long time without needing another charge.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is very good.
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as loud as the ION tailgate speaker, but still makes enough noise for a small gathering. Sound quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Still working great after lots of use only flaw is that you ...
customer_reviews.text: Still working great after lots of use only flaw is that you have to listen to everything with extra bass even if you want to listen to a show or anything on it there's no option to normalize the sound
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new speaker at the perfect time for a pool party. As soon as I turn it on everyone started dancing and having a great time. It sounds great and it is very easy to use. I'm very impressed with sound quality. For the money you just can't find a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: EdgarR

customer_reviews.title: Bad connectivity and range and battery life
customer_reviews.text: Connectivity and range is horrible. Takes forever to connect and range is maybe 15’. Sound quality is decent. I thought this thing was hot shish when I bought it but it’s kinda aggravating now. Battery life has really declined since the 2 years I’ve had it. Sure there’s some better ones on the market now. Price is worth it I guess
customer_reviews.author: charles bruner

customer_reviews.title: best speaker
customer_reviews.text: great speaker, its bluetooth, loud, and battery on this is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Ali

product_meta.title: G-Project G-Boom Wireless Bluetooth Boombox Speaker Rugged Portable Speaker with Rechargeable Battery (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackPress reviews "at $100, it's a tremendous value. Highly recommended." - mashable "g-boom is the ultimate $100 wireless boombox" - ilounge“for $100 you'll be hard-pressed to find another portable Bluetooth speaker that delivers as much bass as the g-boom.” - CNET "between the sound quality, sheer power, and incredibly sturdy construction, no speaker priced this aggressively delivers so much value for the dollar. It was the best overall speaker we tested all year, and this was a big year for speakers." - ilounge meet g-boom g-boom, named “speaker of the year” by ilounge, is the ultimate Bluetooth boombox that pumps out big sound in a rugged, portable package. Sturdy enough to take on any adventure and loud enough for your neighbors to hear - Whether they like it or not. G-boom features: powerful sound, bass that carries: delivered through a 2.1 speaker configuration, dual rear-firing bass ports, Maxx audio digital sound processing for optimum bass and built in EQ with three optimized presets wireless streaming: a simple one-button wireless pairing to connect to your mobile devices, smartphone, tablet or computer with Bluetooth rechargeable battery: built with a 6-hour ion-lithium rechargeable battery to keep your music going all day long Built tough: built with a rugged housing structure, protective rubber base and integrated handle, so you can carry your music anywhere and everywhere customer service We stand behind our products and want all of our customers to enjoy their G-Project speaker on every adventure you go on. If you have any questions, our support team is here to help via email, phone and social.
feature_bullets: TOP RATED PRESS REVIEWS: "At $100, it's a tremendous value. Highly recommended." - Mashable "G-BOOM is the ultimate $100 wireless boombox" - iLounge "For $100 you'll be hard-pressed to find another portable Bluetooth speaker that delivers as much bass as the G-BOOM." - CNET

CONNECT QUICKLY AND EASILY IN SECONDS to Bluetooth devices including: iPhone, iPad, iPod, Samsung, Kindle, Smartphones, Tablets; play audio from laptops, PCs, and non-Bluetooth devices using the 3.5mm / AUX-IN jack
RECHARGEABLE BATTERY allows for up to 6-hours of on-the-go playtime
BUILT TOUGH with rugged housing, protective rubber base and an integrated handle for easy carrying
ON BOARD CONTROLS allow you to play and skip tracks wirelessly with buttons right on the speaker
